section.title: Virtual Machine and Templates Comparison Sections
section.para: The following table describes the different sections for comparison information.

entry.para: Use this section to see basic information on the file location of the virtual machine, its name, and the virtual machine monitor vendor. Hardware, disk, CD/DVD drives, floppy drive, network adapter, and volume information is also included.
Use this to see users and groups for the virtual machine, including those which may be unauthorized compared to a template.
Use this to see Guest Applications, Win32 services, Linux Init Processes, Kernel Drivers, File System Drivers, and Patches.
Use this to see all tags.
